title: Leading states based on motorcycle registrations - U.S. 2017
summary: The Leading states State in the motorcycle registrations was State Ohio , who made 842543 registrations .
The most states State was Pennsylvania , with just 258487 registrations .

In second place was State Florida with 586267 registrations ; third place went to State California with 842543 registrations ; fourth place went to State Michigan with 258487 registrations and fifth place went to State New_York , who was 392178 registrations .
gold: This statistic represents the leading U.S. states based on motorcycle registrations in 2017 . With some 842,000 motorcycle registrations , California was ranked first that year . The total number of motorcycle registrations was more than 8.7 million units in 2017 .
